greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k), 0<=k<=n, read by rows, given by [1, 2, 2, 4, 3, 6, 4, 8, 5, 10, 6, 12, . . . ] DELTA [2, 1, 4, 2, 6, 3, 8, 4, 10, 5, 12, 6, . . . ] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938.
comment: Related to preferential arrangements of n elements (A000670) and necklaces of sets of labeled beads (A000629).
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Jun 18 2005
